item.title: Overcoming Checked Exceptions in Java Lambdas
item.description: In Java 8, the long awaited Lambda came to live, making it easy(-er) to do FP in Java. One problem I came across is, that most Java code throws checked exceptions which leads to IMHO ugly try/catch blocks in lambdas:
